name: Lunar Rover
description:
Features

Map
  • Explore a 36 km² map inspired by real geographical features of the moon.
  • Discover unique lunar landscapes.
  • Discover 12 different locations including famous landing sites, craters and more!

Rover
  • Drive the Lunar Roving Vehicle used during the Apollo mission.
  • Experience the unique characteristics of driving in a low gravity environment.
